name: Space Spectrum
description:
the aim is to travel as far as you can.

achieve this by jumping over gaps, picking up colours and swapping lanes where possible. To swap lanes, you must have already collected that colour previously. Beware - the grey pickups will void you of all additional colours you have! Picking up additional colours will earn you a multiplyer to your final score.

use space bar to jump

left + right arrow keys OR A + D keys to move left and right.

This is still work in progress so feedback is welcomed.

This game was made within the two weeks of #RainbowJam17. The progress of this game will continue on after the game jam.
